storyInfo: The stage has been set, and the fun is about to begin.

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Signor, are you alright?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Just dreaming.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's why you shouldn't sleep on the sofa.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Where's the old man?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The Don went to the theater.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Are you going too?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Leontuzzo does not answer, only sinking deeper into the sofa.
Rossati, Giovanna.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Cellinia, our original agreement was to ensure the Bellones come out on top.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But, I've changed my mind.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: As long as you succeed, you don't owe us anything.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: At that point, you're free to go.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: This, I promise you as the Fang of Zaaro, il Signore dei Lupi.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.text: From the time she returned to the residence at sunset, to the break of dawn the next day...
Listening to the falling rain, Texas wiped down her sword while reading the script that was handed to her—'La Morte di Texas.'
The story twists and turns, never straying far from what she's known.
But first, she needs to sharpen her sword.
Today, it may have to be a bit swifter than usual.

attributes.content: Tsk, tsk. The sun's still getting in my eyes, even though it's raining.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Prison food's not too bad. You should give it a try.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're right about that. I've even given 'em a few suggestions before.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Now get in the car.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Can I sit this one out?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Does killing a single Columbian really deserve so much fanfare?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The Don says Cellinia's gonna be there too.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What's the plan?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: She'll pretend to be an actress, and once the performance starts, you'll improvise the rest.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Hmm... So what about my costume?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What the Don meant was—
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: You wait in the audience and play along.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Oh, right. Haha.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What an insensitive old jerk. So where's he gonna be? He's not trying to find a nice place to watch the show all by himself, is he?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The Don has other business. He's got a meeting.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: A meeting?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Yeah, with a carwash worker.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Howdy, Sora. I just knew you'd be practicin' in Miss Caterina's studio.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I ain't gonna stop ya, but don'tha think you oughta head to the theater early? To do some makeup n' get ready n' whatnot?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yeah, you have a point.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Exusiai's already off to buy breakfast. We got just enough time to meet her.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Say... Didn't we say we'd set up a big ol' welcome for Exusiai's sister?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: We did.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But now I'm not sure we'll have enough time for that.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Croissant, watch your step!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Huh? Wooooah!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Owwie...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm fine, I'm fine. Just tripped on a little somethin'.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Dangit, I knocked over that stack of books. Lemme tidy 'em up.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Huh? A picture dropped outta somethin'.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Picture?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Wait... Huh?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Lookie here!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: It is a photograph from many years ago.
Sora can barely make out the background that should be of the wide and bustling streets of Columbia past.
In the center of the photograph stands a middle-aged man who wears a kind expression, but exudes an audacity not to be trifled with.
On his left and right sides stand a Lupo girl, and a Feline girl.
The girl on the left has beautiful blonde hair and sports a cheery expression, and even at a glance, one can immediately tell that she has a bubbly personality.
The girl on the right has black hair, her face betraying no emotions, making it difficult for one to guess the contents of her heart.
Look, this pitcher... ain't that... Texas, as a kid?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: And standin' there with her... That's Caterina?!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: And look on the back here...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Written on the backside of the photo: 'Giovanna and Cellinia, 1080.'
Giovanna... Is that gonna be Caterina's real name?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Giovanna... Giovanna Rossati.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: How long has this carwash been open?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Five years.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Five years? Coincidentally, that's how long my guard tuskbeast has been missing.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: If only I knew how he was doing these days.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: The city's a pretty big place. There's always a way to survive.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: It never made any sense to me before. I fed him plenty of meat, gave him a nice den. Why wasn't he happy?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Think he might've been vegetarian?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Maybe. Maybe it never knew how bad meat actually was until it tried a full-course meal.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: It's better to not eat at all... than to eat something bad.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Your car's done.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: You're pretty good at your job.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Practice makes perfect.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Heh. You never fail to get it done just right.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: But, Danbrown, nothing lasts forever.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: It's time for you to change your tastes.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: ...I'll think about it.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Think carefully. Once you've figured it out, you're always welcome to come back.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Are you the backup bassist?
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh, um... Is that your natural hair color?
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: That's special. Usually, you have to dye your hair to work as a bassist. I've heard only those with Famiglia Texas blood have that eye and hair color.
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: And, now that I'm seeing you up close, your eyebrows... look really similar to Salvadore's. Are you his bastard or something?
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: No, I have nothing to do with Texas.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: All sorts of coincidences out there, huh?
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: Okay, take a seat over there. Your foundation's really good, so I should be able to get you squared away in no time.
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: Theater Box
Pardon me, are you satisfied with your seating?
attributes.name: Theater Manager

attributes.content: Yes, I've got a fine view.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Excellent, excellent.
attributes.name: Theater Manager

attributes.content: If there's anything you need, please don't hesitate to call for me.
attributes.name: Theater Manager

attributes.content: Let's head down.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You're not going to stay and watch?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You know I've never been a fan of this sort of stuff. How about I grab you a nice drink?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I'd like—
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Brandy, I know.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Sorry I'm late!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No worries. Everyone's still getting ready.
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: Go ahead and take a seat. I'll do your makeup first.
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What's wrong? You don't look too well. Are you getting stage fright?
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: No, I'm fine.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Don't worry, Sora. You've been working so hard, everyone's gonna love you for sure!
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: I hope so.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh right, did you know...?
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Apparently, the bassist got sick and couldn't make it to the performance.
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: Huh? What are you going to do then?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's no big deal. The director was able to find a stand-in. She's getting her makeup done in another dressing room right now.
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: A stand-in... Are you sure that's going to work?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Just trust the director's judgment, alright?
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: Speaking of the director, he didn't come tonight?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: He just dropped by to give some direction before leaving again. I think he's meeting with a guest.
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: Important people are always so busy, huh?
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: But it's okay, Sora. You just need to play your part, that's all.
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, if it isn't Judge Lavinia!
attributes.name: Onsite Staff

attributes.content: I haven't seen you here for a while. Have you come to watch tonight's opera?
attributes.name: Onsite Staff

attributes.content: No, I'm just passing by.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's too bad. But, did you know we're putting on the highly-anticipated 'La Morte di Texas'? I'm sure you'll love it.
attributes.name: Onsite Staff

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm not in the mood.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's alright then. I look forward to your next visit.
attributes.name: Onsite Staff

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: (Danbrown? What's HE doing here?)
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: (Did he really... take my advice and come to the theater to unwind?)
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: (But, today's performance is...)
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Wait a second.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Oh, did you change your mind?
attributes.name: Onsite Staff

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: One ticket please.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Theater Box
Don Bernardo, someone's here to see you.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: It's Rubio, Segretario di Sicurezza Alimentare.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Let him in.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Don Bernardo—
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You can just call me 'director' here.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Ah, yes, yes. It's an honor to be here, Director.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Take a seat, Signor Segretario.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Let's enjoy the show first, then we'll talk.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Signore e signori, thank you for being here tonight. You are about to see another spectacular performance brought to you by Compagnia dell'alba.
attributes.name: Announcer

attributes.content: 'La Morte di Texas,' Act II, written by Signorina Caterina.
attributes.name: Announcer

attributes.content: Every Siracusan already knows the story of Salvadore, but how many truly know the details?
attributes.name: Announcer

attributes.content: Signora Caterina, who has a deep understanding of Famiglia Texas, provides us with her frank yet intricate perspective.
attributes.name: Announcer

attributes.content: Let us delve deeper into the life of Salvadore!
attributes.name: Announcer

attributes.content: (Inhales deeply, then exhales.)
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Break a leg, Sora!
attributes.name: Makeup Artist

attributes.content: Right, time to go!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Phew... Finally found them.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Attagirl, Sora scored us seats with a great view.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Great expectations for her, all around.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Excuse me, would you mind letting us through?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: A Sankta girl... An unusual sight in Siracusa.
Ehh? You're a Sankta too?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I've been in Volsinii for a while, and this is the first time I've seen one of my people.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hehe, looks like it's one good thing after another today.
Go right on by, child.
What's wrong?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That's weird... I don't sense any emotions from him. Is he a strayed Sankta?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But, he's unlike any of the other Sankta strays I've seen...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Well, whatever. By the way, am I the only one who thinks way too much of this crowd looks like mobsters?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I hear tell the head of the Rossati Family's here tonight.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hey, isn't that what you were just talking about?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yep. But let's just enjoy the show for now.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Singing) In an era when chaos and opportunity came hand-in-hand; some were swallowed by the tides of the times where others found in it their promised land.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (Singing) Violence and wealth, power and order.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (Singing) Onto Columbian soil steps a Siracusan, bringing with him only scars, hardship, and ambition.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (Signing) And thus begins our tale. Ladies and gentlemen, come and bear witness, to whom this era truly belongs.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That voice...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I see how it is. You're here to bring her back, aren't you?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But do you really think that's going to happen?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Who the hell are you?
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: Signore e signori, let the show begin!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It really is you, Cellinia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Texas?!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: —Ehh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: For a brief moment, Texas shifts her eyes to one of the boxes.
She knows Bernardo is sitting there, gazing down upon everything.
She feels it in her heart.
Whether coincidence or some form of necessity, in this moment, Sora is both a danger and a safe haven.
Everything depends on her.
The movement in the auditorium and the faint sounds in the distance all prelude the start of the assassination.
She gestures to Sora for her to stay silent, then proceeds to pluck the strings in her hands.
A most wonderful performance has begun.
